headline: Wisconsin Slow Cooker Brats
name: Wisconsin Slow Cooker Brats
description: Bratwurst are slow cooked in beer with onions and ketchup before being finished on a grill.
recipeIngredient: 2 (12 fluid ounce) cans or bottles beer

recipeInstructions.text: Place bratwurst, beer, onion, and ketchup in a slow cooker. Pour water over mixture until everything is covered. Set slow cooker to HIGH and cook for 4 hours.
Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat and lightly oil grate.
Grill bratwurst on preheated grill until they are browned, about 5 minutes.
